text.english: Hear a just cause, O LORD, Attend to my cry; Give ear to my prayer which is not from deceitful lips. Let my vindication come from Your presence; Let Your eyes look on the things that are upright.
text.arabic: اِحْفَظْنِي يَا اللهُ لأَنِّي عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ. قُلْتُ لِلرَّبِّ: [أَنْتَ سَيِّدِي. خَيْرِي لاَ شَيْءَ غَيْرُكَ.
